statements: SELECT * FROM surgical_instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, calibration_date FROM surgical_instruments WHERE precision_adjustment > 0.5;
SELECT id, instrument_name, calibration_date FROM surgical_instruments ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM surgical_instruments WHERE last_service_date IS NULL;
SELECT id, instrument_name, precision_adjustment FROM surgical_instruments WHERE calibration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM surgical_instruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT id, instrument_name, calibration_date FROM surgical_instruments WHERE precision_adjustment > 0.5;
SELECT instrument_name, calibration_date, last_service_date FROM surgical_instruments WHERE last_service_date IS NULL AND precision_adjustment < 0.3;
SELECT id, last_service_date FROM surgical_instruments WHERE calibration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM surgical_instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%Scalpel%' AND precision_adjustment = 0.7;
SELECT * FROM calibration_data WHERE calibration_id = 1;
SELECT calibration_date, calibration_value FROM calibration_data WHERE instrument_id = 100;
SELECT calibration_date, calibration_value FROM calibration_data WHERE instrument_id = 200 ORDER BY calibration_date ASC;
SELECT calibration_id, calibration_value FROM calibration_data WHERE calibration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM precision_adjustments WHERE adjustment_type = 'calibration';
SELECT * FROM calibration_data WHERE calibration_value > 100 ORDER BY calibration_date DESC
SELECT calibration_id, calibration_date FROM calibration_data WHERE calibration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT instrument_id, AVG(calibration_value) AS average_value FROM calibration_data GROUP BY instrument_id
SELECT * FROM precision_adjustments WHERE adjustment_type = 'Bias Correction' ORDER BY adjustment_date ASC
SELECT calibration_id, instrument_id, adjustment_value FROM calibration_data INNER JOIN precision_adjustments ON calibration_data.instrument_id = precision_adjustments.instrument_id
SELECT * FROM calibration_data;
SELECT calibration_id, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM calibration_data ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM calibration_data WHERE calibration_value > 100;
SELECT instrument_id, manufacturer_name FROM instrument_details WHERE instrument_type = 'Spectrometer';
SELECT * FROM precision_data ORDER BY precision_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM calibration_data ORDER BY calibration_date DESC, calibration_value ASC
SELECT calibration_id, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM calibration_data WHERE calibration_value > 100 ORDER BY calibration_value DESC
SELECT instrument_id, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM calibration_data WHERE calibration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT instrument_type, manufacturer_name, purchase_date FROM instrument_details WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE 'A%'

SELECT instrument_id, instrument_type, manufacturer_name, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM calibration_data INNER JOIN instrument_details ON calibration_data.instrument_id = instrument_details.instrument_id
SELECT * FROM calibration_data;
SELECT instrument_id, timestamp, calibration_value FROM calibration_data WHERE calibration_value > 0.5;
SELECT instrument_id, calibration_date FROM calibration_history ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT serial_number, manufacturer, model FROM instrument_data WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM precision_adjustments WHERE adjustment_factor < 0.2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM calibration_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT calibration_value, timestamp FROM calibration_data JOIN instrument_data ON calibration_data.instrument_id = instrument_data.instrument_id WHERE instrument_data.manufacturer = 'Manufacturer A';
SELECT * FROM calibration_history WHERE technician_name IN ('John Doe', 'Jane Smith') ORDER BY calibration_date ASC;
SELECT instrument_id, model, serial_number FROM instrument_data WHERE manufacturer = 'Manufacturer B';

SELECT calibration_data.calibration_value, precision_adjustments.adjustment_factor FROM calibration_data JOIN precision_adjustments ON calibration_data.instrument_id = precision_adjustments.instrument_id WHERE calibration_data.timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND precision_adjustments.timestamp < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM CalibrationData ORDER BY calibration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT instrument_id, calibration_values FROM CalibrationData WHERE instrument_id = 'abc-123' ORDER BY calibration_date ASC;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialization, contact_information FROM Surgeons WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM SurgicalInstruments WHERE manufacturer = 'Medtronic' OR manufacturer = 'Stryker';
SELECT * FROM SurgicalInstruments WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY instrument_name DESC
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT surgeon_name, specialization, contact_information FROM Surgeons WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' AND surgeon_name LIKE 'Dr%'
SELECT instrument_name, manufacturer, model, serial_number FROM SurgicalInstruments WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Ltd' ORDER BY model DESC
SELECT instrument_name, manufacturer, model, serial_number FROM SurgicalInstruments WHERE manufacturer = 'PQR Inc' AND model LIKE 'XYZ%'
